name: Atropos
description: Atropos (Greek: Ἄτροπος) is one of the three Primordial Sisters of Fate, the oldest sister and the cutter of threads who ends the life of everyone with her razor-like claws, be they mortal or god. She is defeated along with her younger sister, Lahkesis, when Kratos traps them inside their own mirror and shatters it.

biographicalInformation.status: Alive (trapped inside her own mirror by Kratos)
